metadata.Title: CVE-2009-1960 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
inc/init.php in DokuWiki 2009-02-14, rc2009-02-06, and rc2009-01-30, when register_globals is enabled, allows remote attackers to include and execute arbitrary local files via the config_cascade[main][default][] parameter to doku.php.  NOTE: PHP remote file inclusion is also possible in PHP 5 using ftp:// URLs.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2009-1960` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dokuwiki - 0.0.20131208-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dokuwiki package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.0.20131208-1').
